metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Wauwatosa. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: Scott Cayo, CFP®

heroDescription: Wauwatosa, Wisconsin, is a vibrant suburb of Milwaukee known for its rich history and diverse community.
landscapeDescription: Wauwatosa boasts a stable economy supported by healthcare, retail, and education sectors. Its proximity to Milwaukee enhances its appeal for businesses and residents alike.
uniqueNeeds: Wauwatosa requires tailored financial advice due to its unique suburban dynamics and diverse economic base.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Wauwatosa's healthcare sector is strong, but economic diversification is needed. Real estate prices are rising, posing bubble risks. Prepare for potential flooding and winter storms.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Wauwatosa's economy has shown resilience, with a growth rate of 3.5% attributed to healthcare and retail expansions.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), Wauwatosa's median household income is $75,000, reflecting a stable and affluent community.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Wauwatosa increasingly specialize in retirement planning and estate management.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), Wauwatosa's cost of living is approximately 10% higher than the national average, driven by housing and healthcare costs.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), Wauwatosa's real estate market is competitive, with home values rising 8% year-over-year, indicating strong demand.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Wauwatosa offers a favorable business climate with low taxes and a supportive local government for small businesses.
